name: Good, Bad, Beaver (GGJ2022)
description:
This beaver isn't such simple person... What to do when your measured life turns upside down? How did I end up here? Where did the wounds come from? Whose wallet is in pocket? No, it's not a stormy Friday - it's two personalities who met in the same body.

Game script is here.

Credits:

  • 7go7 - developer (idea)
  • Amirel - game designer (quests, story, narrative, 2d arts)
  • juliett247 - 3d artist (mother of beavers, concept art, story)
  • vmikhav - game designer (story, gameplay)
